sentences.sentence: It is one of the most difficult fields to contain for the purpose of statistical quantification.
sentences.translation: 就统计量化而言，它是最难以涵盖的领域之一。

sentences.sentence: QUANTIFICATION was a word Robert McNamara loved.
sentences.translation: “定量”此词乃罗伯特·麦克纳马拉之爱。

sentences.sentence: Quantification can create the illusion of precision.
sentences.translation: 量化能给人精确的假象。
